t: Amazon.com : Sanpellegrino Italian Sparkling Drink, Grapefruit, 11.15 Fl Oz (Pack of 6) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: But seriously, I love you San Pellegrino Pompelmo. Marry me. ... This is a sparkling fruit beverage and it tasted great - too great for unsweetened, flavored mineral water. One look on the back of the can told me why. It has plenty of sugar in it - as much as a regular soda. No wonder it tasted so good! We use a splash of this in our grapefruit flavored unsweetened seltzer water & enjoy the delicious flavor with only a little bit of sugar. One good thing about this brand ...
